messages.message:
Shouldn’t we not show the response if the moderation call fails?
This is on prod with “Research mode”
CC: @Hari are you the person to tag here?
Thanks Andy!! Will take care! @Aayush @Subash Can you pls take this up for Converse, Chatbot and Search respectively?

We had a similar discussion when implementing this.
• Responses are always moderated from OpenAI side and has an appropriate responses in cases like above
• Moderation banner is added for queries as a legal requirement and as a disclaimer that these queries will be flagged in the system
I don't see any particular reason to hide the reason (unless the users are nerdy enough to jailbreak GPT:sweat_smile:). I would still like to hear @margaret.tomaszczuk’s thoughts in this.
